svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2021-04-20T01:20:42.087Z" agent="5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/14.5.1 Chrome/89.0.4389.82 Electron/12.0.1 Safari/537.36" etag="WTCShk30S3fsHFELcwqs" version="14.5.1" type="device"><diagram id="w-ChPSnSS3uab-eeM74l" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.div: check dependencies( python, Azure CLI, etc)
upload ARM template and app artifacts into storage account
access uploaded artifacts via SAS token
Try to init SQL schema with manual steps
Deploy ARM init_sql_schema.json to execute PowerShellinit_schema.ps1
build custom-init.sql with contained users and permisson grants
Save critical secrets and token in KeyVaults
upload sampled/simulated data onto storage account

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
